name: Narcissus (itch) (Cursed Bish Studio)
description:
The city is lost to the infected, an airstrike is inbound that will level every building to the ground. You and your greed have decided to dash into the city with 5mins to spare to slaughter some infected, grab some gold and get out before it is too late. 

In this short demo you must find and destroy 3 infected portals in under 5mins. 

Left mouse : Quick Shoot

Hold left mouse : Auto fire

Hold Right mouse : Aim

Space bar : Jump

Collect power ups to vastly improve your shooting ability.

Collect gold coin, ammunition tins and health but avoid poison slime.
